casebody.data:
No. 10-506. Josefina Cruz, Petitioner v. New York City Department of Education, et al. 562 U.S. 1109, 131 S. Ct. 830,

178 L. Ed. 2d 558,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9789. December 13, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 376 Fed. Appx. 82.
